plugins\/multimedia\/index.md.Ce plugin rend visible le service PulseA: This plugin makes the PulseAudio service visible on your internal network, you can then control it from a PC running GNU / Linux and ensure that the music played on your PC is sent to the sound output of Jeedom

plugins\/multimedia\/index.md.Ainsi, via Jeedom et ce plugin PulseAudi: Thus, via Jeedom and this PulseAudio plugin you can run Deezer on your PC under GNU / Linux (or Windows with the compatible PulseAudio client) and ensure that the sound is sent to the bluetooth speakers connected to Jeedom as well as to the sound output ( HDMI / Jack) from Jeedom to complete with an amplifier
plugins\/multimedia\/index.md.Ce mode simultané arrivera prochainement: This simultaneous mode will arrive soon with the possibility of putting a latency, avoiding the delay between the HDMI / Jack / Bluetooth sound outputs, perfect for the evening mode both on the terrace with the Bluetooth speakers and in the room with the amplifier
